quote: Unexpressed emotions will never die. They are buried alive and will come forth later in uglier ways. – Sigmund Freud
fact: Between 25% and 33% of the population sneeze when exposed to light.

joke: How did the hipster burn the roof of his mouth? He ate the pizza before it was cool.
